# Lost and Found

[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Global%20Game%20Jam-2021-181717.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-space-7)

**Global Game Jam 2021**\
**Theme**: "Lost and Found"

## Installation

- Install .NET 5.0 SDK
- Compile (or obtain) the server binaries
- Navigate to the binary directory
- Run `dotnet LostInSpace.WebApp.Server.dll`

## Credits
